Trade/Device Name(s): Diagnostic Hybrids D3 DFA Herpes Simplex Virus Identification and Typing Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Diagnostic Hybrids D3 DFA Herpes Simplex Virus Identification and Typing Kit using immunofluorescence with monoclonal antibodies to detect and type HSV-1 and HSV-2 in cell cultures.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and typing of human herpes simplex virus type 1 and type 2 (HSV-1 and HSV-2) in cell cultures by immunofluorescence with fluoresceinated monoclonal antibodies; negative results do not rule out infection and should not be used as sole basis for clinical management.
